name: Space Shooters (AlphaDEV)
description:
Shoot all of them! No! NO! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! 

Welcome to the world of EARTH. HUMANITY lived peacefully with Robots. But then the Robot's coding got so advanced that they could think by themselves. So they decided to take over EARTH and wipe out all of HUMANITY. They managed to take over EARTH but 3 teen kids survived. LEO, UNKNOWN, and UNKNOWN. You 3 decide to go to SPACE to survive. You have oxygen and make it there safe and sound. But the Robots found you and want to kill you defend yourself with one PLASMA  BLAST and 2 friends.

Will you survive?
